content.webTitle: Australian Politics Weekly podcast: on the campaign trail

fields.headline: Australian Politics Weekly podcast: on the campaign trail
fields.bodyText: In this inaugural podcast, Katharine Murphy is joined by Guardian Australia's political editor Lenore Taylor to digest the Pre-election Economic and Fiscal Outlook – or Pefo - an independent forecast detailing the state of the budget with predictions for debt, deficit, growth and unemployment. Also up for discussion: Sunday night's leaders' debate - the first of three possible such meetings before election day. And the current state of the national opinion polls. We also hear from Paula Matthewson, a blogger who also curates a weekly collection of political writing at No Crap App and is editor of election group blog, AusVotes 2013. Leave your thoughts below. To subscribe to the podcast click here
